title: I Wish This Old Man Would Leave
itunes:title: I Wish This Old Man Would Leave
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, 5 years ago, I got involved with an older   married man that was my boss. In the beginning, it was strictly business and I met his entire family. Then after several business trips together, we ended up having sex and we’ve been together since then. He’d stay at my house at least four nights a week and he paid all of the bills. He was also very controlling and stopped me from hanging out with my girlfriends and most of my family. It was just me and him..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
